Version notice:

Lab 11 - Security and Securing the BIG-IPÂ¶

You have seen numerous security features already, but logging can be just as important to securing the BIG-IP. In the lab you will set up audit logging and log BIG-IP LTM message to a remote syslog-ng server. You will also learn to about additional logging and security features you can implement.,

301a Objectives covered:
  • 2.12
    • Determine the appropriate LTM device security configuration to protect against a security threat

Estimated completion time: 30 minutes

  • More Security Features
  • BIG-IP Remote Logging
